links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien
The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
In November [[1969]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Leslie Holloway''', producer of the event "An Afternoon in Middle-earth".<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 746</ref>

*'''Publication:''' Parts of the letter were published in the programme booklet ''[[An Afternoon in Middle-earth]]''.<ref name=CG/>
*'''Contents:''' Tolkien "''writes to decline the invitation, and comments on his connections with the West Midlands''".<ref name=CG/>

{{references}}
